ISSUE.TITLE: No need to implement ILocalizedEntity on the ProductAttributeValuePicture class
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.70 We don't need to implement ILocalizedEntity interface on the ProductAttributeValuePicture class because it contains only identifiers and no string properties

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7155 Prevented to save customer IP address in the forum post if the CustomerSettings.StoreIpAddresses setting is disabled

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7196 Removed redundant implementation of ILocalizedEntity from ProductAttributeValuePicture class
